languages.text:
Any time an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} uses the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} bonus, a voidborn character can instead use the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} bonus, if it is higher.
Additionally, voidborn characters can always upgrade Intelligence even if their {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} does not allow it.
languages.original_text:
При расчете действия любых {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}талантов{/g} вместо бонуса к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g} может использоваться бонус к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекту{/g}, если он больше.
Кроме того, пустотнорожденный персонаж всегда может повышать Интеллект, даже если его {g|Encyclopedia:Career}архетип{/g} не позволяет этого делать.

traits.locale_text:
Any time an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} uses the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} bonus, a voidborn character can instead use the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} bonus, if it is higher.
Additionally, voidborn characters can always upgrade Intelligence even if their {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} does not allow it.

Any time an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} uses the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} bonus, a voidborn character can instead use the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} bonus, if it is higher.
Additionally, voidborn characters can always upgrade Intelligence even if their {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} does not allow it.

Any time an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} uses the Fellowship {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}, a voidborn character can instead use the Intelligence bonus, if it is higher.
Additionally, voidborn characters can always upgrade Intelligence even if their {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} does not allow it.

languages.text: Immer wenn eine {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} oder ein {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talent{/g} den {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschafts{/g}-Bonus nutzt, kann ein Leerengeborener stattdessen den {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g}-Bonus anwenden, wenn dieser höher ist. Außerdem können Leerengeborene immer ihre Intelligenz verbessern, auch wenn ihr {g|Encyclopedia:Career}Archetyp{/g} dies nicht erlaubt.
languages.original_text:
Any time an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} uses the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} bonus, a voidborn character can instead use the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} bonus, if it is higher.
Additionally, voidborn characters can always upgrade Intelligence even if their {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} does not allow it.

traits.locale_text:
Immer wenn eine {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} oder ein {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talent{/g} den {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschafts-{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} nutzt, kann ein Leerengeborener stattdessen den {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz-{/g}Bonus anwenden, wenn dieser höher ist.
Außerdem können Leerengeborene immer ihre Intelligenz verbessern, auch wenn ihre {g|Encyclopedia:Career}Doktrin{/g} dies nicht erlaubt.

languages.text:
Chaque fois qu'une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} ou un {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} utilise le bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g}, un personnage hors-monde peut privilégier l'utilisation du bonus d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} si celui-ci est plus élevé.
De plus, les personnages hors-monde peuvent toujours améliorer leur Intelligence, même si leur {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archétype{/g} ne le permet pas.
languages.original_text:
Any time an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} uses the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} bonus, a voidborn character can instead use the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} bonus, if it is higher.
Additionally, voidborn characters can always upgrade Intelligence even if their {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} does not allow it.

traits.locale_text:
Chaque fois qu'une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} ou un {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} utilise le {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de Sociabilité, un personnage hors-monde peut privilégier l'utilisation du bonus d'Intelligence si celui-ci est plus élevé.
De plus, les personnages hors-monde peuvent toujours améliorer leur Intelligence, même si leur {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archétype{/g} ne le permet pas.

languages.text:
无论什么时候，如果虚空之子的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}需要计算{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}加值时，如果虚空之子的智力更高，则可以改用{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}加值。
另外，即便是在{g|Encyclopedia:Career}职业{/g}不允许的情况下，虚空之子在升级时也可以无视限制，提高智力。
languages.original_text:
Any time an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} uses the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} bonus, a voidborn character can instead use the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} bonus, if it is higher.
Additionally, voidborn characters can always upgrade Intelligence even if their {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} does not allow it.

traits.locale_text:
无论什么时候，如果虚空之子的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}需要计算{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}时，如果虚空之子的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}更高，则可以改用智力加值。
另外，即便是在{g|Encyclopedia:Career}信条{/g}不允许的情况下，虚空之子在升级时也可以无视限制，提高智力。

无论什么时候，如果虚空之子的{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}需要计算{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}时，如果虚空之子的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}更高，则可以改用智力加值。
另外，即便是在{g|Encyclopedia:Career}职业{/g}不允许的情况下，虚空之子在升级时也可以无视限制，提高智力。

languages.text:
Cuando una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} o un {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talento{/g} usan la bonificación por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g}, un personaje nacido en el vacío puede usar su bonificación por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g} si es mayor.
Además, los personajes nacidos en el vacío siempre pueden mejorar su Inteligencia aunque su {g|Encyclopedia:Career}arquetipo{/g} no lo permita.
languages.original_text:
Any time an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} uses the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} bonus, a voidborn character can instead use the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} bonus, if it is higher.
Additionally, voidborn characters can always upgrade Intelligence even if their {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} does not allow it.

traits.locale_text:
Cuando una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} o un {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talento{/g} usan la {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g}, un personaje nacido en el vacío puede usar su bonificación por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g} si es mayor.
Además, los personajes nacidos en el vacío siempre pueden mejorar su Inteligencia aunque su {g|Encyclopedia:Career}doctrina{/g} no lo permita.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}タレント{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}FEL{/g}ボーナスを使用する時、虚空生まれのキャラクターは代わりに{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g}ボーナスを使用できる（そちらのほうが高い場合）
さらに、虚空生まれのキャラクターは{g|Encyclopedia:Career}タイプ{/g}で認められていなくとも、常に知性をアップグレードできる。
languages.original_text:
Any time an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} uses the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} bonus, a voidborn character can instead use the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} bonus, if it is higher.
Additionally, voidborn characters can always upgrade Intelligence even if their {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} does not allow it.

traits.locale_text:
{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}タレント{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を使用する時、虚空生まれのキャラクターは代わりに{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}ボーナスを使用できる（そちらのほうが高い場合）
さらに、虚空生まれのキャラクターは{g|Encyclopedia:Career}ドクトリン{/g}で認められていなくとも、常に知性をアップグレードできる。

{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}または{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}タレント{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}を使用する時、虚空生まれのキャラクターは代わりに{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}ボーナスを使用できる（そちらのほうが高い場合）
さらに、虚空生まれのキャラクターは{g|Encyclopedia:Career}タイプ{/g}で認められていなくとも、常に知性をアップグレードできる。

languages.text:
При расчете действия любых {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способностей{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}талантов{/g} вместо бонуса к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g} может использоваться бонус к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекту{/g}, если он больше.
Кроме того, пустотнорожденный персонаж всегда может повышать Интеллект, даже если его {g|Encyclopedia:Career}архетип{/g} не позволяет этого делать.

Additionally, voidborn characters can always upgrade Intelligence even if their {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} does not allow it.

languages.text:
Uçsuzdoğan karakterlerde, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g} bonusu kullanan bir {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}becerinin{/g} etkisi hesaplanırken karakterin Zekâ bonusu daha yüksekse Sosyallik yerine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Zekâ{/g} niteliği kullanılır.
Ayrıca uçsuzdoğan karakterler, {g|Encyclopedia:Career}arketipleri{/g} izin vermese bile Zekâ niteliklerini geliştirebilirler.
languages.original_text:
Any time an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} uses the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g} bonus, a voidborn character can instead use the {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} bonus, if it is higher.
Additionally, voidborn characters can always upgrade Intelligence even if their {g|Encyclopedia:Career}archetype{/g} does not allow it.
